page.title: 12Denominations
page.content: The main religion is Christianity though the Bahai'i faith,the Jehovah's Witnesses and Buddhism have made some converts.There are two Anglican churches,one Catholic church,and a number of nonconformist places of worship covering the following denom- inations:United Reformed Church, Baptist,Presbyterian,Society of Friends,and the Evangelicals.The Jehovah's Witnesses have a Kingdom Hall in Howey and there is a Sharma Study Group.A Christian Conference Centre and a Baptist Christian Guest House are also in use.For a small town there is considerable religious activity and this is indicative of the predominantly middle-aged and aged character of the population.Religious groups which prove most attractive to the young are those with a definite set of beliefs such as the Baptists.
